title: '96L fake voters added': Raj Thackeray urges EC to halt local body polls; oppn plan march
description: Maharashtra Navnirman Sena chief Raj Thackeray alleged the addition of 9.6 million fake voters, urging the Election Commission to postpone local body elections until the issue is resolved. Shiv Sena (UBT) MP Sanjay Raut announced a meeting with election officials, joined by Uddhav Thackeray, Raj Thackeray, and Sharad Pawar, to address voter list discrepancies and alleged electoral irregularities.

title: Diwali 2025: Transform couple portraits using Gemini Nano Banana; use these prompts
description: This Diwali, Google's Gemini Nano Banana AI is revolutionizing festive greetings. Users can now transform selfies into stunning, hyper-realistic Bollywood-style couple portraits with just a few words. Imagine yourself in designer outfits against temple backdrops or amidst dazzling fireworks. The feature offers personalized, festive art, making this year's celebrations uniquely memorable.

Despite strong knocks from Mandhana (88) and Harmanpreet Kaur (70), India faltered late in the chase, jeopardizing their semifinal hopes ahead of must-win games against New Zealand and Bangladesh.

title: China’s Q3 GDP growth slows to lowest in a year — Key points
description: China's economy experienced its weakest pace in a year, growing less than 5% due to sluggish domestic demand and US trade tensions. While exports and industrial production showed strength, a significant drop in fixed-asset and property investment, alongside weak retail sales, weighed down overall growth.

title: Israel strikes Gaza again; fragile truce faces new test — 10 things to know

While the US insists the truce holds, "some shooting" by Hamas was acknowledged.  Mediators are working urgently to prevent renewed conflict amid mounting civilian casualties and a brief aid suspension.

title: Delhi: Air quality ‘very poor’ on eve of Diwali; Grap-2 imposed
description: Delhi's air quality plunged into the 'very poor' category ahead of Diwali, triggering Stage 2 of the Graded Response Action Plan. Experts predict a further decline to 'severe' levels by Tuesday due to Diwali fireworks and unfavorable weather, with toxic air expected to persist all week.

title: From steam to speed: The journey of Indian railways and the making of modern India
description: Indian Railways began with just 34 kilometres of track in 1853. Today, it runs over 69,000 kilometres, connecting cities, people, and industries across the country. The Hindu’s latest e-book, Moving Millions: The Magic of the Mundane in Indian Railways, traces this 172-year journey from steam engines to high-speed trains, from colonial infrastructure to a national lifeline.

title: Silver market crisis: Panic in London! How market broke – Is demand in India the cause?
description: India's Diwali silver buying frenzy, fueled by social media hype, triggered a global market crisis. Unprecedented demand drained inventories, leading to a severe shortage and extreme price volatility. This surge, combined with industrial growth and ETF accumulation, pushed the silver market to its breaking point.

title: “Translators must become writers”: Salma in conversation with Kavitha Muralidharan
description: Tamil writer and MP Salma spoke about the creative and emotional depth involved in translation during a conversation with journalist Kavitha Muralidharan at The Hindu office. She highlighted how Tamil’s unique idioms and cultural nuances challenge translators, yet allow her stories, often centred on Muslim women, to reach global audiences. Salma reflected on the fear she faced after publishing her debut novel, and how translations helped her voice resonate beyond Tamil Nadu. She emphasised that translation is not just linguistic transfer, but a creative act shaped by the translator’s own understanding and sensitivity.

title: Notes & Chords | Amritha Murali on how to appreciate a Carnatic music concert
description: Carnatic musician Amritha Murali, trained in both vocal music and violin from a young age, has carved a niche for herself with her expansive repertoire and deep-rooted classicism. Under the mentorship of R.K. Shriramkumar for over a decade, she continues to evolve as a performer and teacher. Her concerts are known for their rigour and aesthetic consistency, drawing listeners across generations. In this conversation with The Hindu, Amritha reflects on her artistic journey, the discipline behind her craft, and how audiences regardless of familiarity can connect with Carnatic music.

description: India is emerging as a global leader in renewable energy, with solar power driving a major shift in the electricity landscape. In the first half of 2025, solar and wind met the country’s rising energy demand, reducing coal use and emissions. This marks a significant moment in the global energy transition, as renewables overtook coal for the first time. With record growth in solar capacity and a steady rise in wind and hydro, India’s clean energy push is reshaping the path toward net-zero targets.

The exchange highlighted a common sentiment that emotional appeals often outweigh logic in online debates, leaving many feeling unheard.

title: After going for AI agents, laying off 4K employees; Salesforce CEO says: AI doesn't have a soul
description: Salesforce CEO Marc Benioff is sending mixed signals on AI's workplace impact. While the company replaced 4,000 customer support roles with AI agents, Benioff claims AI lacks the human touch essential for sales. Despite these cuts, Salesforce is hiring thousands of new salespeople, highlighting a strategic division of AI's application.

title: Andre Agassi, Steffi Graf’s daughter Jaz introduces new partner

The legendary tennis couple's children are described as normal, with Jaz enjoying typical teenage outings and son Jaden pursuing baseball. Agassi emphasizes fatherhood as his most important role, cherishing his bond with his children.

title: Mitch Marner’s net worth: Check how much wealth Golden Knights right winger has
description: Mitch Marner, a dynamic right-winger, has joined the Vegas Golden Knights on a significant eight-year, $96 million contract, boosting his estimated net worth to $20-25 million.  His move from the Toronto Maple Leafs, following a career-best 102-point season, also brings lucrative endorsements from major brands. Fans anticipate his impact on the upcoming NHL season.

title: Lauren Kyle turns heads in chic NYC night out as McDavid hits road
description: While Connor McDavid's Oilers faced a tough loss in New York, his wife Lauren Kyle captivated fans with a glamorous girls' night out. Sharing stylish moments on Instagram, she showcased elegance and city sophistication, enjoying espresso martinis with friends. Her vibrant presence off the ice highlights the dynamic lives of NHL partners.
